title: Making the Cut
description: Marcus Diamond stands at the helm of Diamond Jewellers, his brainchild company on the brink of a new product; synthetic diamonds. As Marcus deals with the mounting pressure from his shareholders and board of directors, he finds himself falling for someone he should not fall for. The stakes are high as Marcus must choose between fighting for his character versus fighting to remain at the helm of his business.Lucy is new at her job and falling fast and hard for her new boss. There is just so much she can do to prevent herself from causing a scandal that would lead to the downfall of a major business magnate: Marcus Diamond.Will Lucy’s decisions impact Marcus’ own struggles or will the two abandon all and seek a new path for themselves?
author: Peyton Lawson
